channel.title: DEATHMATCH - would be epic!!
channel.description:
First of all thx for this awesome mod! It's great to play the legendary story again after so many years. But I'm not the player to play the same singleplayer again and again.
Most important and most "long-time-fun" would have the Deathmatch for me! For me still the most fun deathmatch to play with 4-5 friend! :stuck_out_tongue:
So REALLY hope deathmatch will also be included!!

item.title: DEATHMATCH - would be epic!!
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
death match and XEN are coming

be patient

/thread
